content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. I understand you're interested in HVAC services. May I have your name to get started with scheduling an appointment?
Thanks, Linda. Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're servicing your area?
Thank you, Linda. Let me confirm if we're servicing 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
We do service your area! When would be an ideal time for you to schedule your HVAC service?
To be honest, I'm really busy this month and don't think I can schedule anything until next month.
I understand, Linda. Would you like me to note that and follow up with you next month to schedule your HVAC service?
No, thank you. I'll reach out when I'm ready. Appreciate it!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule at this time
